name: Nutmeg's Adventure
description:
You play as Nutmeg, a hungry fox in search of a meal.  Frolic through a cool, calm autumn field and find yourself some eggs!

Click the FPS counter to be sure the game is receiving input!

Move with WASD or the arrow keys, and jump with the spacebar. Gamepads are also supported: move with the left stick or the D-pad, and jump with A or B.

Due to browser limitations, you may need to press a face button before the game can see your gamepad, and you may need to click in the game window to allow the audio to play.
